description: A restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine, where the emphasis is more on meat in winter and fish in summer. Welcoming ambience, with a number of different dining spaces, including a small room in the wine cellar where numerous bottles act as a backdrop (including a good selection of champagnes) and a spacious outdoor area with views of the lake and well-tended garden.
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Car park, Garden or park, Terrace, Wheelchair access
